body_html:
Thanks! I changed my code to

self.layer3=tf.keras.layers.Conv2D(32, (3, 3), activation='relu', padding='same',kernel_constraint=tf.keras.constraints.max_norm(3))

And now this works. I'm closing the issue. PS: I am using TensorFlow 1.8.
body_text:

And now this works. I'm closing the issue. PS: I am using TensorFlow 1.8.
body:
Thanks! I changed my code to

```
self.layer3=tf.keras.layers.Conv2D(32, (3, 3), activation='relu', padding='same',kernel_constraint=tf.keras.constraints.max_norm(3))
```

And now this works. I'm closing the issue. PS: I am using TensorFlow 1.8.
